General.Name: Suning Commerce Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Suning.com Co., Ltd. engages in the retail business in China. Its stores offer various products, including home appliances, 3C products, and mother-and-baby care products, department store products, and other commodities through offline stores and online malls. It operates self-operated stores and Suning Tesco's retail cloud franchised stores. The company was formerly known as Suning Commerce Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Suning.com Co., Ltd. in February 2018. Suning.com Co., Ltd. was founded in 1990 and is based in Nanjing, China.
